subject: Physics - History and Philosophy of Physics
Physics - Accelerator Physics
creator: Dixon, Roger L.
title: Farewell to the Tevatron
description:
Installation of the world's first superconducting synchrotron began at
Fermilab 30 years ago, but now the Tevatron has finally seen its last beam. The
author looks back at the intriguing story of this pioneering machine.
